::Striker::

Striker looks sadly at Spears. "I'm sorry about your friends," he says 
quietly, "These kind of things happen in wars, though."

He couldn't think of anything better than that to say. He had never been a 
great speaker.

"How long have you been on-line," he asks, trying to change the subject.
